venue.name: Central parking lot behind Market St.

item.description:
BE SURE TO CHECK YOUR E-MAIL ON THE MORNING OF THE RIDE TO SEE MY MESSAGE REGARDING THE WEATHER AND IF THE RIDE IS STILL ON...

Rain or lightening cancels ride, cloudy days we still can ride - Call if you have any question on the morning of the ride. (617) 254-7912

From this link, Search for Merrimack River and then choose the 5th Item "Merrimack River Ride - Medium (1 hit)

Please come with an open mind, a sense of adventure, and a sense of humor....I say this because although the route is marked with arrows and there is a cue sheet, your leader has not ridden the route :-) (60 hour work weeks just don't allow too much planning time!) so we'll have to discover this together!!

Join us for some decent cycling and a boat load of fun!

Riders should have a bike in good condition and expect to ride at a 15-20 mile per hour pace.

Guaranteed to get some exercise and laugh a ton!

Rob - Your Group Organizer

My cell phone will be turned on (617) 254-7912

By the end of this ride, you'll be this strong!
item.name: 35 Mile Merrimack River Ride
